resources.string:
Help:
1. Operate with the Functional Keys as instructed and observe the functionality accordingly
2. After an individual key test, the result is shown automatically according to key functionality, and it continues to the next test
3. Insert headsets with volume +/- buttons to test AC1/AC2 Volume+/-. If the headset is not supporting the 3-buttons operator can judge the test as \‘FAIL\’(should not be an issue).
Power Button (long press and then lift)
